newsitem.title: ZAMBIA: Zambia 3-month T-bill discount rate down slightly.
newsitem.headline: Zambia 3-month T-bill discount rate down slightly.

text.p: The central bank of Zambia sold three-month treasury bills at an average discount rate of 20.6553 percent at its latest auction, it announced on Monday.

The bank said it sold 22 billion kwacha's worth of the 91-day bills on tenders received at last Thursday's weekly auction. The discount rate was slightly down from the previous week's 21.4590 percent.
It also said that 12 billion kwacha's worth of 28-day bills were sold at an average discount rate of 16.3995 percent, down fromn the previous week's 16.4294 percent.
The bank sold nine billion kwacha's worth of six month (182 day) bills at an average discount rate of 20.8941 percent, down from the 21.6472 percent discount rate a week earlier.
